COVID-19

Contagious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus. The first case was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.

Symptoms

  • Cough, Headache, Fatigue or Sore Throat
  • Fever, Shortness of breath or Diarrhea
  • Loss of taste or smell
  • Muscle or body aches
  • Congestion or runny nose
  • Nausea or vomiting

What can we do?

  1. Wear a mask
  2. Wash your hands frequently
  3. Avoid touching your face
  4. Maintain 6FT social distance
  5. Stay home, avoid unnecessary travel and large crowds.
